pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Performance Triangular Distribution Functions // A collection of high-performance functions for the triangular distribution that consists of the probability density function, cumulative distribution function, quantile function, random variate generator, moment generating function, characteristic function, and expected shortfall function. References: Samuel Kotz, Johan Ren Van Dorp (2004) doi:10.1142/5720 and Acerbi, Carlo and Tasche, Dirk. (2002) doi:10.1111/1468-0300.00091.
